title: The Department of Truth, Vol. 4: The Ministry of Lies
description: For decades the Department of Truth battled a secret war against its Soviet counterpart the Ministry of Lies. Now Cole Turner will have to face the consequences of his predecessors as the dark actions of the past unfurl before him...The fourth arc of the Eisner-nominated THE DEPARTMENT OF TRUTH from JAMES TYNION IV (Something is Killing the Children) and MARTIN SIMMONDS (Dying is Easy) is collected here!Collects THE DEPARTMENT OF TRUTH #18-22
author: James Tynion IV
